author: Dianne Wiest

quote: Of these years nought remains in memory but the sad feeling that we have advanced and only grown older.
author: Max Muller

quote: The sad souls of those who lived without blame and without praise.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: How sad it is that we give up on people who are just like us.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: They say geniuses mostly have great mothers. They mostly have sad fates.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: I have a piece of great and sad news to tell you: I am dead.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: I would not know how I am supposed to feel about many stories if not for the fact that the TV news personalities make sad faces for sad stories and happy faces for happy stories.
author: Dave Barry

quote: What if the Soviet intervention was a blessing in disguise? It saved the myth that if the Soviets were not to intervene, there would have been some flowering authentic democratic socialism and so on. I'm a little bit more of a pessimist there. I think that the Soviets - it's a very sad lesson - by their intervention, saved the myth.
author: Slavoj Zizek

quote: You had to be into sport and, sad to say, I'm a traitor to my country because I don't have a sporting bone in my body.
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: I've had moments where I realize my body isn't going to withstand many more seasons, but I am very satisfied with my career and I am trying not to look at retirement as a sad thing.
author: Cat Osterman

quote: The question I love to get asked is: 'What's the hardest part of your job?' And literally, the answer is probably real sad, but it's to just to be me. Like, it's really hard, because I think people, you know, have a set idea of what a pop star should be.
author: Kelly Clarkson

quote: There were points in my life where I felt oddly irresistible to women. I'm not in that state now and that makes me sad.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: Ladies and gentlemen, it is with great sadness that I announce that I will resign as Australia's Minister for Foreign Affairs. I am sad because I love this job. I'm totally dedicated to the work that we are doing in Australia's name around the world, and I believe that we have achieved many good results for Australia, and I'm proud of them.
author: Kevin Rudd

quote: It's a sad indication of where Washington has come, where policy differences almost necessarily become questions of integrity. I came to Washington in the late '70s, and people had the ability in the past to have intense policy differences but didn't feel the need to question the other person's character.
author: Eric Holder

quote: When I moved out of my mom's house at 18 I was almost as sad to leave her sewing machine behind as anything else.
author: Beth Ditto

quote: My favorite thing in the world is a quiz show, 'University Challenge,' so you can see what kind of sad person I am.
author: Lynne Truss

quote: It's a sad state when more people retweet than buy records.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: The hate directed against the colored people here in St. Louis has always given me a sad feeling because when I was a little girl I remember the horror of the East St. Louis race riot.
author: Josephine Baker

quote: Over a 10-year period, 99 out of 100 new entrepreneurs will fail. Only one will be left standing as others get pushed out of the market or burn out from working so hard. It's really sad.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Anyone can go online and write anything they want about people they don't even know, and most of the time, that is fueled by hate. The sad part is that people actually believe what they read online.
author: Colton Haynes

quote: There is something inexpressibly sad in the thought of the children who crossed the ocean with the Pilgrims and the fathers of Jamestown, New Amsterdam, and Boston, and the infancy of those born in the first years of colonial life in this strange new world.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: The end of anything is not fun because there's a nostalgia to it and everything else. Even the end of a bad relationship can feel so, so, so sad.
author: Jessica Capshaw

quote: My mother has stories of leaving me in the bath as small kid, like a 3-year-old, and there being mirrors on the side, and her going to get a towel and coming back in, and me making faces at myself, like, 'Now I'm happy. Now I'm sad.'
author: Allison Tolman

quote: The belief that a person can and should only feel grief over one sad event at a time is a truly disturbing estimate of our emotional capacity.
author: Jennifer Armintrout

quote: Everyone feels sad occasionally. A full range of emotions is part of what makes us human.
author: Michael Greger

quote: I'm very hard on myself. Sometimes too hard on myself. When I lost in the Wimbledon finals, I was so sad, I cried. I had the runner-up trophy! It's still a great accomplishment, but I was so mad.
author: Eugenie Bouchard

quote: One day, I was at my grandmother's house, and I found diaries that she kept as a young girl. I opened one to a page that had flowers glued inside. In her childish handwriting, my grandmother wrote, 'Pap died today. I am very sad.' The fact that this was true and that I could see the withered flowers made a huge impression on me.
author: Laura Amy Schlitz

quote: I had a daughter and lost her a long while ago. That's too sad a story to go into.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: My mother, I suppose, is still a main figure in my life because her life was so sad and unfair, and she so brave, but also because she was determined to make me into the Sunday-school-recitation little girl I was, from the age of seven or so, fighting not to be.
author: Alice Munro

quote: Commerce seems to be covering every aspect of our lives now. Which me, because I'm a romantic, is sad for me to say.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: I remembered myself as an unpopular and rather sad kid.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: When I was a child people simply looked about them and were moderately happy; today they peer beyond the seven seas, bury themselves waist deep in tidings, and by and large what they see and hear makes them unutterably sad.
author: E. B. White

quote: My experience, with both my parents, is that grief has a lot of down, sad things, but I was also really emotionally raw, in the first year after each of them passed. Flowers smelled more intensely, my relationships were hotter, and I was more willing to risk. I was going for it a lot more. I was 'unsober' and I wasn't playing by my rules.
author: Mike Mills

quote: I think I'm probably a very sad man wrapped in a very joyful package, and I think I'm very resilient, and I think I'm quite generous, sometimes to a fault. And I'm very bad with money, but I don't see that too much of a flaw.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: Part of me is drawn to the nature of sadness because I think life is sad, and sadness is not something that should be avoided or denied. It's a fact of life, like contradictions are.
author: Robert Redford

quote: Whenever I'm sad, I just put on 'SpongeBob' and I cheer up.
author: Richard Harmon

quote: 'Flaubert's Parrot' is an amphibious book in which what appears to be a personal essay about Flaubertian writing is gradually, delicately transformed into an extremely sad novel in which the differences between character, author, and narrator are less clear than they appear at first glance.
author: Alvaro Enrigue

quote: I think that's why you see so many Americans in Dublin look so sad: they are looking for the door through which they can begin to understand this place. I tell them, 'Go to the races.' I think it's the best place to start understanding the Irish.
author: Frank McCourt

quote: I grew up feeling 'less than.' I was the sad, shy child hiding in the hall closet beneath coats. I'd wait for my grandmother's voice to call, 'Jewell, Jewell.' I was lost, waiting to be found. I thought being found, I'd be happier, better. All the while, I read stories. Stories with both truth and lies.
author: Jewell Parker Rhodes

quote: I feel most at home when I'm alone. That's not sad. It's just I feel closest to source and connection when I'm by myself.
author: Tituss Burgess

quote: Fashion is that thing that saved me from being sad.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: It makes me sad when I find sisters who aren't joyful. They might smile, but with just a smile they could be flight attendants!
author: Pope Francis

quote: It's sad, something coming to an end. It cracks you open, in a way - cracks you open to feeling. When you try to avoid the pain, it creates greater pain.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: It's an indication of how cynical our society has become that any kind of love story with a sad theme is automatically ridiculed as sentimental junk.
author: Winona Ryder

quote: I always think of the live show first, where the song is gonna go in the show. That's why they aren't sad songs. When I play, I want to make people happy, not sad. It's such a pleasure for me to do what I do, and I want other people to feel some form of that pleasure, too.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: I don't ever want to be sad about my life.
author: Tammy Duckworth

quote: It would be sad if the expertise built up during the 40 years of the U.S. and Russian manned programmes were allowed to dissipate. But abandoning the shuttle, and committing to new launch vehicles and propulsion systems, is actually a prerequisite for a vibrant manned programme.
author: Martin Rees

quote: The sad truth is that most of my husbands turned out to be convincing liars.
author: Joan Collins

quote: I'm incredibly sad that my mother's not here to see my kids and that my kids don't get to know her. And she didn't meet my husband. That's one of the hardest things. I don't even know how to put that into words.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: Many marriages break up over hormonal imbalance, which is truly sad because it comes from a lack of understanding. When hormones are put back in balance with natural bioidentical hormones, a woman or man resumes their normal life of feeling good and having days filled with quality.
author: Suzanne Somers

quote: When you're feeling down, sad, lonely, negative, you don't want to take care of yourself - and the weight problem and the diabetic problem and the heart attack and stroke problems and high cholesterol set in.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: Pageants are already ridiculous and sad, I think.
author: Casey Wilson

quote: I wish I could wear 10 dresses to my wedding. It's so sad that you put it in storage and then never see it again. I am going to sleep in mine after I wear it.
author: Eva Longoria

quote: My father was an urchin that lived in Hell's Kitchen. He was part of a family of nine. I mean, there were times that were better and worse, but mostly, by the time we got to L.A., they'd lost whatever they had. And it was a sad time. And both he and I became truck drivers for different companies.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: One of the things psychologists used to say was that if you are depressed, anxious or angry, you couldn't be happy. Those were at opposite ends of a continuum. I believe that you can be suffering or have a mental illness and be happy - just not in the same moment that you're sad.
author: Martin Seligman

quote: What I find sad is that the New Age movement is primarily a commercial undertaking. But it is answering to a human need.
author: Laura Esquivel

quote: 'The Taxi Ride,' from my second album, is one people want to hear a lot. I'm consciously trying to walk on the sunny side of the street, to really lift myself into a place of greater positivity, and that's a sad song.
author: Jane Siberry

quote: If some people try to make a prenup into a pre-negotiation of a divorce... Well, that's really sad. But I do think that it's important to understand what each person has coming into the relationship, and what each person expects from the relationship. They aren't always fun discussions to have, and they can be very eye-opening.
author: Laura Wasser

quote: I want my clothes to have a life and then end up in a secondhand store, where some cool girl discovers them 20 years later. If the runway or red carpet is the only life clothes have, it's sad.
author: Jeremy Scott

quote: I think I drift toward sad love songs.
author: Benmont Tench

quote: But I'm not like sad, depressed miserable person. I guess sometimes I give off that impression.
author: Edward Furlong

quote: The study of tavern history often brings to light much evidence of sad domestic changes. Many a cherished and beautiful home, rich in annals of family prosperity and private hospitality, ended its days as a tavern.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: With out art, without communicating, we wouldn't live beyond 30 because we'd be so sad and depressed.
author: Wayne Coyne

quote: August used to be a sad month for me. As the days went on, the thought of school starting weighed heavily upon my young frame. That, coupled with the oppressive heat and humidity of my native Washington, D.C., only seemed to heighten the misery.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The history of apartheid-era South Africa is incredibly sad and at times infuriatingly incomprehensible.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: The problem, when comparing contemporary television to television in 1974, is that TV has become not just bad but sad.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The president we have today is a typical Washington politician that's prone to hyperbole and decisiveness and false outrage. And I think it's very sad - very sad to watch.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: He who is not just is severe, he who is not wise is sad.
author: Voltaire

quote: I don't have many sad days.
author: Billy Graham

quote: When I talk about sad things, I talk about sad things.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I think about my father and how sad it was that he never had grandchildren.
author: Cate Blanchett

quote: If a man does not control his temper, it is a sad admission that he is not in control of his thoughts.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: When I was a young girl, I lost a lot of weight over one summer - involuntarily - and was just really depressed and sad. There was nothing I could do to gain weight. I would look in the mirror and call myself disgusting every day.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: That is sad until one recalls how many bad books the world may yet be spared because of the busyness of writers.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: My style is bad white-boy dancing. I can do swing a little bit, but nothing beyond that. My solo dancing is sad. I use my arms, badly.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I'm a human being. I feel all emotions. I'm not just happy all the time. Sometimes, I'm sad and feel the blues. Sometimes I even want to feel the blues. Sometimes, you want to feel down.
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: When I did the film Generations, in which the character died, I felt like a guest for the first time. That made me very sad.
author: William Shatner
